Review Name: Classy product Review Description: This iam reviewing after 10 days from Installation. I can say Voltas, India's most trusted brand. Happy with the installation, was done by professionals from Voltas. Design of the product is good. Given 5 starts because of it's performance, @26 temp setting - 1) Cool's the room (120 square feet room) in no time, no need to turn on the FAN. 2) If door is kept open, then room adjacent to it (130 sq feet) also get pleasant. Thanks Voltas and Flipkart
